org.springframework.data.redis.connection

接口 ReactiveHashCommands

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ReactiveClusterHashCommands

    public interface ReactiveHashCommands
    Redis Hash commands executed using reactive infrastructure.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明

      static class  ReactiveHashCommands.HExistsCommand
      HEXISTS ReactiveRedisConnection.Command.
      static class  ReactiveHashCommands.HGetCommand
      HGET ReactiveRedisConnection.Command.
      static class  ReactiveHashCommands.HSetCommand
      HSET ReactiveRedisConnection.Command.
